mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T09_PER_HIS_STREAM ( HIS_ID , TYPE , PATH , REMARKS , CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{hISID} , #{tYPE} , #{pATH} , #{rEMARKS} , #{cREATETIME} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T09_PER_HIS_STREAM SET HIS_ID = #{hISID} , TYPE = #{tYPE} , PATH = #{pATH} , REMARKS = #{rEMARKS} , CREATE_TIME = #{cREATETIME} WHERE ID = #{iD}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "iD" , HIS_ID AS "hISID" , TYPE AS "tYPE" , PATH AS "pATH" , REMARKS AS "rEMARKS" , CREATE_TIME AS "cREATETIME" FROM T09_PER_HIS_STREAM WHERE ID = #{iD}
SELECT ID AS "iD" , HIS_ID AS "hISID" , TYPE AS "tYPE" , PATH AS "pATH" , REMARKS AS "rEMARKS" , CREATE_TIME AS "cREATETIME" FROM T09_PER_HIS_STREAM WHERE ID = #{iD} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "iD" , HIS_ID AS "hISID" , TYPE AS "tYPE" , PATH AS "pATH" , REMARKS AS "rEMARKS" , CREATE_TIME AS "cREATETIME" FROM T09_PER_HIS_STREAM WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
